summary: A demonstration script that loads a pretrained VAE model, converts an input image to the required tensor format, encodes it into latent space, decodes it back to an image, and displays the original and reconstructed images side by side for visual comparison.
business_intent: Showcase the encoding‑decoding workflow of a VAE, enable quick visual validation of model quality, and provide a reference implementation for developers and researchers working with latent‑space image manipulation.
